input.sentences: we had a lot of fun at the festival . several friends and i went along with our families .
my best friend took her daughter | and i must have taken a dozen pictures of just the two of them .
we all stopped and listened to a local band play | and it was neat to see someone we casually know playing the drums in front of such a large crowd .
we then went and tried some other activities out . the kids had a blast with the sports part of it .
to end the day | my son was able to sing all of us a song | and i am so glad i was able to record it !
output.sentences: A group of friends got together for a concert.
Their friend had a kid that  wanted to go too.
Everyone was having such a blast that they could hardly stand.
The finale was sung by the friend's  son.
